Name: EmbargoName
Description: The name or names by which the embargo is known. Repeat if different names are used for different purposes or different contexts. Language repetition is handled within the structure of the Embargo Name element.

Name: Label
Description: A label or labels for the embargo element. Repeat for differences in content due to software or application constraints. Language repetition is handled within the structure of the label.

Name: Description
Description: Describe the content and coverage of the embargo. Structure supports multiple languages.

Name: Date
Description: Provides the end date of the embargo, which may take the form of a date range (complete or open ended). Note SimpleDate should not be used for an Embargo Date as an embargo is for a period of time.

Name: Rationale
Description: Indicates the reason for the embargo.

Name: AgencyOrganizationReference
Description: Reference to an organization or individual, defined in the organization scheme, responsible for the embargo.

Name: EnforcementAgencyOrganizationReference
Description: Reference to an organization or individual, defined in the organization scheme, responsible for enforcing the embargo.
